snippet: Trevor Daley had a goal and an assist, Kari Lehtonen recorded his fifth shutout of the season, and the host Dallas Stars clinched their first playoff berth since 2008 with a 3-0 win over St. Louis.
abstract: Dallas Stars beat St Louis Blues, 3-0, clinching their first NHL playoff berth since 2008.
lead_paragraph: Trevor Daley had a goal and an assist, Kari Lehtonen recorded his fifth shutout of the season, and the host Dallas Stars clinched their first playoff berth since 2008 with a 3-0 win over St. Louis.
